definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: Bernoulli discovered this number when studying a problem of compounding interest.
sentences.chinese: 伯努利在研究一个复利问题的时候发现了这个数字。

sentences.english: Reinvesting your earnings allows you to take advantage of compounding.
sentences.chinese: 将你赚到的钱继续投资将使你获得复利的好处。

sentences.english: In equivalence of the fund the basic calculating method has laws of simple interest and compound interest law.
sentences.chinese: 资金等值计算基本方法有单利法和复利法两种。

sentences.english: Where there is any interest that cannot be paid on time, compound interest shall be calculated at a penalty interest rate.
sentences.chinese: 对不能按时支付的利息，按罚息利率计收复利。

sentences.english: We will first explain the distinction between compound interest and simple interest.
sentences.chinese: 我们将首先解释复利和单利的区别。

sentences.english: The Erynes or Furies are there, and Dante is protected from looking at them.
sentences.chinese: 但丁在艾琳丝与复利斯在那里接受保护。

sentences.english: Never forget the power of compounding.
sentences.chinese: 永远不要忘记复利的作用。

sentences.english: First of all, Philip figured out the notion of compound interest on his own.
sentences.chinese: 首先，菲利普自己想出了复利的概念。

sentences.english: Compound interest is a powerful tool, so start saving and investing early.
sentences.chinese: 在早期储蓄和投资时，复利是很有效的方式。

sentences.english: Use the magic of compound interest.
Here’s the power of compound interest.
sentences.chinese: 通过以下这个例子，你就能明白复利的威力。

sentences.english: How does it compound over time?
sentences.chinese: 复利如何发挥时间威力。

sentences.english: What an initial amount of 1 becomes when growing at compound interest.
sentences.chinese: 指用复利计算时，起始为1的数额所达到的终值。

definition: certificate of deposit/time deposit/abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]
to invest in stock/to buy shares
